**As a**  [PO]
 **I need** [I need this functionality]  
 **So that** [i can email]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [acceptance criteria is mentioned]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [there are 10 emp]
 When [they try to login
 Then [they are able to login]
 ```
